title: Ambient Video Game Music - Cherry Blossoms 2
description: We present the follow-up to our beloved collection of ambiance packs, taking the tranquil allure of a Japanese garden to new dimensions.
longDescription:
With heartfelt delight, we present the follow-up to our beloved collection of ambiance packs, taking the tranquil allure of a Japanese garden to new dimensions. Each of the 10 packs in this sequel deepens the sensory experience, steeped in the quiet peace of nature and the soft, soothing melodies that embody the spirit of tranquility.


Continuing our exploration of nature's symphony, this collection captures more elements that make a Japanese cherry orchard a haven of calm. You'll hear the delicate rustle of cherry blossoms in the wind and the gentle babble of a meandering stream.


Further enhancing these packs is the sweet melody of bird songs, now offering a wider variety of avian voices. Their music mingles perfectly with the understated pitter-patter of a gentle rain, a recurring theme from our initial collection, but now presented with new, subtle nuances.


The crowning jewel is the serene soundtrack that binds these sounds together. Just as gentle and calming as before, this time it carries new melodies and deeper harmonies, crafted with attention to each soothing detail. This unifying track further ensures a seamless blend of nature's chorus and musical tranquillity, delivering an even more immersive experience.


This sequel gives game developers a wider palette of calming, realistic sounds for crafting tranquil gaming environments. The additional layers of audio realism offer an even more immersive escape for players, painting a vivid picture of peaceful moments under the cherry blossoms. Every rustle, chirp, and raindrop invites players to lose themselves in the serene beauty of these meticulously crafted soundscapes.



This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--

Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
